shapeMap
Class ShapeMap

java.lang.Object
  shapeMap.ShapeMap

public class ShapeMap
extends java.lang.Object

A ShapeMap holds a list of JVShapes, and maps input values from 0 to 1 to shapes in that list.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

          Construct an empty ShapeMap

          Construct a ShapeMap with the specified shapes.
